info.title: How to play
info.description: Guess the word in {tries} tries. After each guess, the color of the tiles will change to show how close your guess was to the word.
info.correctExample: The letter L is in the word and in the correct spot.
info.presentExample: The letter O is in the word but in the wrong spot.
info.absentExample: The letter N is not in the word in any spot.
